text: Julio Gutierrez Garcia (born March 26, 1962 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he cannot see. He is B2/T12 type athlete. He raced at the 1976 Summer Paralympics. He came in second in long jump. == References == Category:Spanish long jumpers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:1976 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12
